attacks.name: Muddy Bomb
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon and 10 damage to each of your opponent's other Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Raging Sea
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.
